text: yeeonjineun jagi jasindeul boda midneun salamdeul-eul deo salanghasimyeo geu ui anaedeul-eun geudeul-ui eomeonideul-iyogeudeul seologan-ui hyeol-yuggwangyeneun hananim-ui yulbeob-eseo midneun salamdeulgwa iju jadeul-i hyeongje gwangyeboda deo gakkaun ingangwangyela geuleona gakkaun donglyo deul-ege jaseon-eul bepulla geugeosdo ha nanim-ui yulbeob-e gilogdoeeo issnola
